$interpreted: Jerome: Whew~ Finally conquered all the grimy roads and foggy forests. At last, this days-long march can produce some actual results...
Jerome: That's Maple Lake ahead; men, focus! Stay sharp for any possible dangers!
Sharice: Boss, is it true Maple Lake's infested with all manner of crazed creatures?
Jerome: It's "Sir"... I've never been to Maple Lake myself, so your guess is as good as mine.
Unhappy Soldier: Once, a senior of mine accompanied the noble Cecil here...
Unhappy Soldier: ...Yet, they were ambushed by some kind of rat monster and its goons. Very few survived to tell the tale.
Irritated Soldier: Had a close friend who used to hunt professionally. He accidentally stumbled into the foggy forests here...
Irritated Soldier: ...was completely wrecked by this wicked fish-tailed siren. He is now both mentally and physically crippled...
Sharice: Huh, so actual monsters...?

Sharice: (Are we really going up against such monstrosities?
Sure, I'm the greatest, but against these savages...)
Jerome: Why are all of you sulking! I won't tolerate this kind of behavior!
Jerome: How dare you insult the uniform of our almighty Kingdom with such cowardice!?
Unhappy Soldier: But...but...
Sharice: (Everyone's petrified...guess I'll have to shoulder the responsibility and protect everyone!)
Sharice: Boss, looks like there's no way around this. I'll brave the paths and get us outta here.
Sharice: Everyone else is already shaking in their boots, can't do anything about it.
Jerome: You're going alone?
Unhappy Soldier: That's right. She's the best on the team; she'll be just fine!
Unhappy Soldier: Good luck, Sharice. We're counting on you!
Sharice: Boss, you heard them. They all trust my abilities. Grant me the permission to go solo. I'll show you what I can do!
Jerome: I said call me "Sir"...hmm...Everyone's tired after such a long journey too, a quick rest wouldn't hurt...
Jerome: Alright. I will allow you to explore the roads ahead. Be careful though, don't stray too far away from the team.
Sharice: Got it. Headin' out, don't miss me!
Sharice: So Maple Lake really is a place with no humans...haven't encountered a single soul...
Sharice: ...Now what? Should I continue?
Sharice: A few more miles shouldn't be a challenge at all for the likes of me...
Sharice: Alright, onwards!
Pang: HEY, behind you!
Sharice: Hmph, I'll show you who's boss!
Pang: Wait!
Sharice: Get lost! One doesn't assault me and sneak away just like that! I'm gonna blow their brains out!
Pang: No good. Walking straight into frogodile territory, only yourself is to blame. You are safe. Leave them be.
Sharice: Damn it, they got away!
Sharice: Hmph. You seem suspicious; one of Maple Lake's creepy creatures, I presume!
Pang: ...Creature? I don't know which feature you're referring to. I am a mere traveler from the East Alliance ...
Sharice: Shut up, wretched monster! Taste my spear!
Puggi: Pang~ where did you catwalk off to? Been looking everywhere and thought you might have gotten lost; eye of a tiger but an absolute cat-astrophe...
Puggi: YIKES!!
Puggi: Eh...what's this? It's soft and warm...
Puggi: Hello? Anybody home? Sweet pea, you ok?
Pang: ...Oh boy.
Puggi: Pang, look at this dismal damsel in distress. Should I play the hero now and save princess?
Puggi: Or is she your type?
Puggi: If she is, just say the magic word. I don't fight over ladies with my lads.
Pang: Hmm...looks like we should take her back first and tend to those wounds...

Model.Text: Whew~ Finally conquered all the grimy roads and foggy forests. At last, this days-long march can produce some actual results...
That's Maple Lake ahead; men, focus! Stay sharp for any possible dangers!
Boss, is it true Maple Lake's infested with all manner of crazed creatures?
It's "Sir"... I've never been to Maple Lake myself, so your guess is as good as mine.
Once, a senior of mine accompanied the noble Cecil here...
...Yet, they were ambushed by some kind of rat monster and its goons. Very few survived to tell the tale.
Had a close friend who used to hunt professionally. He accidentally stumbled into the foggy forests here...
...was completely wrecked by this wicked fish-tailed siren. He is now both mentally and physically crippled...
Huh, so actual monsters...?

(Are we really going up against such monstrosities?
Sure, I'm the greatest, but against these savages...)
Why are all of you sulking! I won't tolerate this kind of behavior!
How dare you insult the uniform of our almighty Kingdom with such cowardice!?
But...but...
(Everyone's petrified...guess I'll have to shoulder the responsibility and protect everyone!)
Boss, looks like there's no way around this. I'll brave the paths and get us outta here.
Everyone else is already shaking in their boots, can't do anything about it.
You're going alone?
That's right. She's the best on the team; she'll be just fine!
Good luck, Sharice. We're counting on you!
Boss, you heard them. They all trust my abilities. Grant me the permission to go solo. I'll show you what I can do!
I said call me "Sir"...hmm...Everyone's tired after such a long journey too, a quick rest wouldn't hurt...
Alright. I will allow you to explore the roads ahead. Be careful though, don't stray too far away from the team.
Got it. Headin' out, don't miss me!
So Maple Lake really is a place with no humans...haven't encountered a single soul...
...Now what? Should I continue?
A few more miles shouldn't be a challenge at all for the likes of me...
Alright, onwards!
HEY, behind you!
Hmph, I'll show you who's boss!
Wait!
Get lost! One doesn't assault me and sneak away just like that! I'm gonna blow their brains out!
No good. Walking straight into frogodile territory, only yourself is to blame. You are safe. Leave them be.
Damn it, they got away!
Hmph. You seem suspicious; one of Maple Lake's creepy creatures, I presume!
...Creature? I don't know which feature you're referring to. I am a mere traveler from the East Alliance ...
Shut up, wretched monster! Taste my spear!
Pang~ where did you catwalk off to? Been looking everywhere and thought you might have gotten lost; eye of a tiger but an absolute cat-astrophe...
YIKES!!
Eh...what's this? It's soft and warm...
Hello? Anybody home? Sweet pea, you ok?
...Oh boy.
Pang, look at this dismal damsel in distress. Should I play the hero now and save princess?
Or is she your type?
If she is, just say the magic word. I don't fight over ladies with my lads.
Hmm...looks like we should take her back first and tend to those wounds...
